name: Emotional AI Utility Workflows
description: Collection of N8N workflows for supporting the emotional AI system

workflows.name: Email Management
workflows.description: Handle email reading, sending, and organization

workflows.name: Calendar Management
workflows.description: Manage calendar events, reminders, and scheduling

workflows.name: Web Research
workflows.description: Perform web searches and information gathering

workflows.name: File Operations
workflows.description: Handle file management, organization, and processing

workflows.name: Emotional Profile Evaluation
workflows.description: Evaluate emotional profiles and conversation quality

workflows.name: Conversation Analytics
workflows.description: Analyze conversation patterns and emotional responses

workflows.name: Mood Tracking
workflows.description: Track user mood patterns and emotional state

setup_instructions: 1. Import each workflow JSON file into your N8N instance
2. Configure webhook URLs in the emotional AI core system
3. Set up authentication credentials for external services
4. Test each workflow with sample data
5. Enable webhooks and scheduled triggers as needed
